# IOLockAlloc | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IOLockAlloc ](/documentation/driverkit/iolockalloc)

-  IOLockAlloc 

Function# IOLockAlloc

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
struct IOLock * IOLockAlloc();
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/driverkit/iolockalloc#return-value)

Pointer to the allocated lock, or zero on failure.

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iolockalloc#discussion)

Allocates and initializes a mutex.

Allocates a mutex in general purpose memory, and initializes it.
